oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Rolley-hole marble making machine
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Finding Community
Schools
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Wooden box with belt-turned machinery on wheels.
Bud Garrett invented this machine to make rolley hole marbles and built a marble yard in Celina, Tennessee, in the 1940s.
